comments.author: Jojo Howard

comments.text:
Really? With me it was the other way round. When I got into kpop a few 
years ago, my main problem was that I thought everyone was too young. I 
came from jrock/jpop fandom and every band/artist I liked was like 25+, and 
then I got into kpop and even the biggest artists weren't even 30, like 
BoA, Rain (at the time), TVXQ, SNSD, Big Bang, etc. I usually like older 
artists, cuz I look up to them. When they're like my age I can't take them 
too seriously. That's probably why I'm loosing interest in kpop, since I'm 
20 now, the bands that are more in the media nowadays like exo and stuff 
are more or less my age and idk but that kinda turns me off..
